pageDescription: Test your knowledge with AI-generated trivia questions!
categorySelectorDescription: Or enter your own topic below.
customTopicExplanation: Let our AI generate unique trivia questions about your favorite topic, hobby, or anything you can imagine! Just type it in and play.
loadingCustomBatch: Generating your custom trivia game ({count} questions) for "{topic}" ({difficulty}). This may take a moment...
errorLoadingQuestionDetail: Could not fetch a new question. Please check your connection or try a different topic.
errorLoadingCategoriesDetail: Could not fetch categories. Please try refreshing the page.
errorNoUICategories: No categories are currently set to display. You can still try a custom topic.
errorNoCategoriesDefined: No categories are defined in the system. Please contact an administrator or try a custom topic.
errorNoQuestionForDifficulty: Could not fetch a new question for the "{difficulty}" level. Please try again or a different topic.
errorNoMoreQuestionsForCustomTopicDiffic: No more questions available for the topic "{topic}" at "{difficulty}" difficulty from the current batch. Try a different difficulty or create a new game.
errorNoQuestionsForCustomTopic: Could not generate any questions for your custom topic. Please try a different topic or wording.
errorGeneric: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
footerText: © {year} AI Trivia Master. Powered by GenAI.
selectDifficultyDescription: Choose the difficulty for the topic: "{topic}"
gameOverScore: Final Score: {correct} correct, {incorrect} incorrect out of {total} questions.
initialDownloadError: Error downloading offline questions. Some features may be limited.
initialDownloadNoCategories: No predefined categories found to download for offline play.
initialLoadSkipped: Offline questions not available (IndexedDB issue or first time).
updatingOfflineContentVersion: App content has been updated. Refreshing local data...
offlineContentVersionUpdatedMessage: Local content updated. Ready to play!
offlineContentUpdateError: Error updating local content. Some features might be limited.
categoryDownloadComplete: Questions for {categoryName} downloaded and ready for offline play!
categoryDownloadError: Error downloading questions for {categoryName}. Please try again.
subcategoryPageDescription: Choose a more specific topic or play all questions from {parentName}.
validatingCustomTopic: Validating your custom topic with AI...
confirmCustomTopicDescription: Our AI has processed your topic: "{topicName}". Please review and confirm to proceed.
customTopicInstructionsLabel: AI Generated Instructions for Question Creation
customTopicRejectedDefaultReason: The AI could not process this topic. Please try a different or more specific topic.
customTopicValidationError: An error occurred while validating your custom topic. Please try again.
customTopicConfirmNote: AI will generate a batch of ~{count} questions for this topic which will be saved for multiple game sessions.
customTopicStorageError: Could not save your custom topic. Please try again.
visualCategoryTooltip: This is a visual category with image-based questions.
deleteCustomTopicConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the custom topic "{topicName}"? This will also delete all of its saved questions and cannot be undone.
customTopicDeletedError: Could not delete the custom topic. Please try again.

LandingPage.title: Unleash Your Knowledge, Challenge the AI.
LandingPage.subtitle: Dive into an endless universe of trivia! Choose a category or invent your own, and let our advanced AI generate unique, challenging questions just for you.
LandingPage.featuresTitle: Why You'll Love AI Trivia Master
LandingPage.featureEndlessTopicsDesc: From history to quantum physics, or even your favorite TV show. If you can name it, you can play it.
LandingPage.featureAiPoweredDesc: Experience a new set of questions every time you play, dynamically generated for a unique challenge.
LandingPage.featureAdaptiveDesc: Our AI adjusts the difficulty based on your performance, keeping the game engaging and fair.
LandingPage.featureBilingualDesc: Play and learn in both English and Spanish, with all content generated bilingually.

ProfilePage.title: My Profile
ProfilePage.historyDescription: Here are the results from your previous games.
ProfilePage.noHistory: You haven't played any games yet. Go play a round!
ProfilePage.errorLoadingHistory: Could not load your game history. Please try again.
ProfilePage.statsDescription: A summary of your trivia performance.
ProfilePage.highlightsDescription: Your standout categories based on performance.
ProfilePage.notEnoughDataForHighlights: Play at least {count} questions in a category to see highlights.

aboutSection.title: About AI Trivia Master
aboutSection.intro: Welcome to AI Trivia Master! This interactive game tests your knowledge across various categories or your own custom topics. Questions, answers, and explanations are dynamically generated by AI, offering a unique experience every time.
aboutSection.featureAI: AI-Generated Questions: Fresh trivia on any topic.
aboutSection.featureCategories: Flexible Categories: Choose predefined or enter custom topics.
aboutSection.featureDifficulty: Adaptive Difficulty: Questions adjust to your skill level.
aboutSection.featureBilingual: Bilingual Support: Play and learn in English or Spanish.
aboutSection.feedbackEncouragement: We value your input! Use the form below for suggestions or feedback.

contactForm.title: Suggestions & Feedback
contactForm.description: Have an idea to improve the game or a general comment? Let us know!
contactForm.submitError: Failed to send suggestion. Please try again.

LoginPage.title: Admin & User Login
LoginPage.description: Please enter your credentials to log in.
LoginPage.descriptionSignUp: Create a new account to save your progress.
LoginPage.errorInvalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
LoginPage.errorGeneric: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
LoginPage.adminOnlyNote: Admin login provides access to the management panel.
LoginPage.toggleToSignUp: Don't have an account? Sign Up
LoginPage.errorEmailInUse: This email is already in use. Please log in or use a different email.
LoginPage.errorWeakPassword: Password should be at least 6 characters.
LoginPage.errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.

AdminLayout.accessDenied: You do not have permission to access the admin panel.

AdminDashboardPage.title: Admin Dashboard
AdminDashboardPage.description: Overview and quick access to management sections.
AdminDashboardPage.manageCategoriesDescription: View, add, edit, or delete trivia categories.
AdminDashboardPage.manageQuestionsDescription: Browse, search, and manage predefined trivia questions.
AdminDashboardPage.manageReportsDescription: Review and take action on user-submitted question reports.
AdminDashboardPage.manageSuggestionsDescription: View and manage feedback and suggestions from users.
AdminDashboardPage.manageUsersDescription: View all registered users and manage their roles.

AdminCategoriesPage.title: Manage Categories
AdminCategoriesPage.description: View, add, edit, or delete trivia categories. Assign parent categories to create hierarchies.

AdminReportsPage.description: Revisa y gestiona los reportes de preguntas enviados por los usuarios.
